item.title: Trying to make an npc talk in dialogue box
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

ok i want it so when you click on an npc it says wanna go to karajama? and then options yes or no… and if you click yes it teleports you if you say no it cancels heres what i ahve so far

case 40: sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902); sendFrame126("", 4903); sendFrame126("Do you want to go on a trip to Karjama?", 4904); sendFrame126("It's free.", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

now how do i make it work and why is it case 40

Read full topic
